Cinema Studies: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                                Skip to content        Department of Cinema Studies _Copy Undergraduate Graduate MIAP Home Dual BA/MA Program Asian Film and Media Initiative (AFMI) Certificate in Culture and Media Financial Aid and Scholarships Course Offerings News & Events Faculty & Administration Alumni Cinema Resources Blog Announcements  home > Cinema Studies        35mm Projection Comes to Cinema Studies Since March 2010, the Michelson Theatre has been home to a pair of custom Kinoton FP20 35mm projectors.           more >          :: see next story 35mm Projection >               more         3rd Annual Experimental Film Lecture: Ken Jacobs The 2010 installment in the Experimental Film Lecture Series, presented with Undergraduate Film and Television, brought Ken Jacobs to the Michelson Theatre to present new work.           more >          :: see next story Ken Jacobs >               more         Marina Abramovic Lecture World renowned performance artist Marina Abramovic visited Cinema Studies in February 2010 to discuss work from her past and present.          more >          :: see next story Marina Abramovic Lecture >               more         MIAP  News and Events  MIAP Alumni Receive 4 of 10 Prestigious National Residencies  Cinema Studies Pecha Kucha Night  Cinema Studies Summer Courses 2015            Undergraduate Admissions Graduate Admissions Academic Services Student Life Financial Aid and Scholarships Career Development Counseling Services International Students Incoming Students Graduation Forms What is Special Programs?
